attributes.action: Grant The Stig from Top Gear the opportunity to carry the Olympic Torch in ondon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Stig has become something of a Great British Institution and is one of the finest sports and television personalities this country has ever seen. I therefore believe that it is only right that The Stig carry the Olympic Torch in London. It is about time that he received the worldwide recognition he deserves. What better way to celebrate Britain and this Great Man (if indeed he is a man) than to fulfill this duty. And what a way to start the Olympic Games!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
